name: Netflix tokenized stock (xStock)
description: Netflix xStock (NFLXx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. NFLXx tracks the price of Netflix, Inc. (the underlying). NFLXx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of Netflix, Inc., whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. Key Benefits Netflix is a media company that provides entertainment services, including streaming movies, TV shows, and games, through a subscription-based model. It also produces its own original content and licenses content from other companies.
